Empowring by connecting
 
Tell Me More

 

Services

Focus on products than worrying about the distribution network.

See how we help our clients grow faster and get their great products reach beyond borders.

Explore

We explore the opportunities, look out for new products and study the market. We are either intrigued by a huge demand from the buyer side or receive a purchase order from our clients.

Making Connections

Given our large network of connections in Europe, Middle East and North America we will begin to find the right end users to sell the product to.

Deliver

Once the buyer has been identified we will work with the seller to prepare the export from the source and facilitate the import on the destination to get the product delivered to the hands of right people.

About

Find out how Genixers began and expanded quickly.

  • Let the
    journey
    begin

    Began Our Journey

    After some extensive evaluation of the market we identified our position and began our journey to become one of the key players in the world's trading marketplace. We formed the company in the heart of Houston, Texas and based on our strong team with decades of business development experience and years of mobile and digital market expertise in USA, Europe and Middle East.

  • Setting a great
    start

    Our Way

    Many our great leads set us to a very sucessful and fast pasing start. We set a great start already by securing multiple trade in Europe.

  • Be Part
    Of Our
    Story!
